messages.message: Invalid transferFunction for basic DFD. For a non-sRGB vkFormat with sRGB variants it must not be KHR_DF_TRANSFER_SRGB.
messages.details: Basic DFD #1 transferFunction is KHR_DF_TRANSFER_SRGB but for vkFormat VK_FORMAT_ASTC_3x3x3_UNORM_BLOCK_EXT it must not be KHR_DF_TRANSFER_SRGB.
